TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClusterLoadInformation extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the end time (in UTC) of last resource balancing run.

value.para: The end time of last resource balancing run.

summary.para: Gets the starting time (in UTC) of last resource balancing run.

value.para: The starting time of last resource balancing run.

summary.para: Gets a list of load metrics information object. Each entry is for a certain metrics.

value.para: A list of load metrics information object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
